name: Keen Sight
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Tighnari, equip this card.
After Tighnari equips this card, immediately use Vijnana-Phala Mine once.
When your Tighnari, who has this card equipped, is affected by Vijnana Suffusion, the character's Charged Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.
(You must have Tighnari in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1702]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1702] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S17022]</color> once.
When your $[A1702], who has this card equipped, is affected by <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117021]</color>, the character's $[K51] costs 1 less $[K309].
(You must have $[A1702] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tighnari</color>, equip this card.
After Tighnari equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Vijnana-Phala Mine</color> once.
When your Tighnari, who has this card equipped, is affected by <color=#FFFFFFFF>Vijnana Suffusion</color>, the character's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color> costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>.
(You must have Tighnari in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: Mistakes are part of learning... However, these mistakes should be corrected upon being discovered.
source: Reward for inviting Tighnari to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
